Kang Kyung Yoon stated the female celebrities in the rumors have no connection to the chat room, and many of the victims "are not aware they are victims of hidden cameras."

Dispatch also stated, "From our investigation, no famous celebrities were found to be victims of the videos in Jung Joon Young's phone."
